alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Mercer (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 10:14PM EST until January 09 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Mercer and Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Dangerous conditions are expected along Interstate 80 for the next several hours. Remember, `Pull Aside, Stay Alive`.
